articles.author: Kenneth Niemeyer
articles.title: Elon Musk Just Gave a Shoutout to This New Apple Feature - Business Insider
articles.description: Elon Musk praised Apple's new hearing aid feature for AirPods, despite his rocky history with the tech giant.
articles.content:
Elon Musk, who has previously criticized Apple, appears to have been won over by one new feature. 
Apple CEO Tim Cook on Thursday shared an advertisement for the company's new hearing aid offering o… [+1718 chars]
